metadata.title: CVE-2017-18221 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The __munlock_pagevec function in mm/mlock.c in the Linux kernel before4.11.4 allows local users to cause a denial of service (NR_MLOCK accountingcorruption) via crafted use of mlockall and munlockall system calls.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-18221` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
